title: The First Ever Radio Hour 6/27/22
itunes:title: The First Ever Radio Hour 6/27/22
description:
On this weeks radio hour - we’re taking you over the pond to Europe and the UK! 

Jeremy is on tour overseas so he’s playing some great tracks from bands like Birds in Row, Chalk Hands, La Petite Mort / Little Death, Daitro, Rise and Fall, Disfear, High Vis, Skitsystem, Idles, and more!

Subscribe to the PATREON and receive a brand new radio hour every Sunday! Thats two additional episodes a month AND you get them a day early! You'll also see a complete list of songs played on this episode.

Follow the show on Instagram and Twitter!
